title: Book Train Tickets
description: A traveler wants to book two first-class train tickets from Paris to Amsterdam.

tasks.description: Search for available trains from Paris to Amsterdam on the desired date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several train options with first-class availability.

tasks.description: Select the desired train and provide the total price for two first-class tickets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the selection and total cost.

tasks.description: Book the train tickets and issue them to the traveler.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the tickets and provides a booking reference.
